-e ---

𒆪𒌌𒆷𒄴;𒆪𒌌𒆷𒄷 kulla-; ku-ul-la-h; ku-ul-la-hu call

𐤒𐤋 call "voice"

call ⇔ tell tale

write dallu-; tallu-; ta-al-lu-h; da-al-lu-ha; ta-al-lu-h-šu
speak, talk turi; turu-; tu-ru-nu-un-ki; tu-ru-h; tur-ri-qa
say tiri-; turu-; ti-ri-in-ri; ti-ri; tu-ru-uk; tu-ru-un

𓎡 𓇋 𓇋 𓃷 ka'i Guaraní 猴 kâu > 猴 hóu howl call cry
